DOC.brief_summary: The investigator create interactive knee osteoarthritis ( OA ) risk calculator estimate user 's risk develop symptomatic knee OA well user 's risk undergoing total knee replacement ( TKR ) within lifetime . To test impact calculator , investigator recruit OA-free subject Amazon 's Mechanical Turk . Participants randomize either access general information OA use risk calculator addition access general OA information . The investigator hypothesize participant randomize risk calculator arm would accurate perception knee OA risk would increase willingness change risky behavior compare general OA information group .
DOC.brief_title: Risk Risk Perception Knee Osteoarthritis US
DOC.criteria: Participants must age 25 45 Participants must live United States Participants must diagnose osteoarthritis All participant meet inclusion criterion
